summary: In 1985, in a coastal town, the friends Koldo, Peti, Tito, Eugenio and Moni stumble with a woman dressed like Santa Claus trapped in a hole in the woods. While to boys go to the police ... See full summary »
cast: Maru Valdivielso|Christian Casas|Roger Babià|Pau Poch|Daniel Casadellà|Ivana Baquero|Elsa Pataky|José Torija|Loquillo|Saurí|Nacho Moliné|Antonio Duque|Ana Isabel Velásquez
title: Cuento de navidad
